0.6.1.name: wordpress/faxy-card-vcard
0.6.1.description:
Wordpress plugin that will replace your main content with a 1 page plugin.

Plugin page for more info.

Features

  • you can change all the text for links.
  • you can change all the text for titles.
  • you can change all the text for description.
  • replaces current theme with the vcard only for non-logged in users.
